title: TISS Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Assistant Manager Posts
description: The Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Assistant Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, Post-graduation, can apply for the TISS Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection proces...
